00019 #ifndef _ALCHEMY_TASK_H
00020 #define _ALCHEMY_TASK_H
00021 
00022 #include <sched.h>
00023 #include <semaphore.h>
00024 #include <errno.h>
00025 #include <copperplate/list.h>
00026 #include <copperplate/syncobj.h>
00027 #include <copperplate/threadobj.h>
00028 #include <copperplate/cluster.h>
00029 #include <alchemy/task.h>
00030 
00031 struct alchemy_task {
00032         char name[32];
00033         int mode;
00034         cpu_set_t affinity;
00035         int safecount;
00036         struct syncobj sobj_safe;
00037         struct syncobj sobj_msg;
00038         int flowgen;
00039         struct threadobj thobj;
00040         struct clusterobj cobj;
00041         void (*entry)(void *arg);
00042         void *arg;
00043         RT_TASK self;
00044 };
00045 
00046 struct alchemy_task_wait {
00047         struct RT_TASK_MCB request;
00048         struct RT_TASK_MCB reply;
00049 };
00050 
00051 #define task_magic      0x8282ebeb
00052 
00053 static inline struct alchemy_task *alchemy_task_current(void)
00054 {
00055         struct threadobj *thobj = threadobj_current();
00056 
00057         if (thobj == NULL ||
00058             threadobj_get_magic(thobj) != task_magic)
00059                 return NULL;
00060 
00061         return container_of(thobj, struct alchemy_task, thobj);
00062 }
00063 
00064 struct alchemy_task *get_alchemy_task(RT_TASK *task, int *err_r);
00065 
00066 struct alchemy_task *get_alchemy_task_or_self(RT_TASK *task, int *err_r);
00067 
00068 void put_alchemy_task(struct alchemy_task *tcb);
00069 
00070 static inline int check_task_priority(int prio)
00071 {                               /* FIXME: HIPRIO is lower over Mercury */
00072         return prio < T_LOPRIO || prio > T_HIPRIO ? -EINVAL : 0;
00073 }
00074 
00075 extern struct syncluster alchemy_task_table;
00076 
00077 #endif /* _ALCHEMY_TASK_H */
